column2: Location of data collection/ data collection site #
The total number of 10 cm x 10 cm subquadrats occupied by the algal species. The minimum is 0, the maximum is 25, and partial subquadrats are allowed
The total number of subquadrats occupied by the holdfasts of the algal species. The minimum is 0, the maximum is 25, and partial subquadrats are allowed
Count of all individual animals found within the quadrat
